select exam_id ,exam_name ,dep_id,avg(exam_grade) as dept_avg_grade,depart_name,count(person_id) as count from smart_people p left join sys_user su on p.person_id = su.id left join sys_user_depart d on d.user_id = su.id left join smart_exam_information e on e.id =p.exam_id left join sys_depart sd on sd.id = d.dep_id
e.id = #{examId}
e.id= (select e.id from smart_exam_information e WHERE e.exam_endtime <= NOW() order by e.exam_endtime desc LIMIT 1)
group by dep_id,exam_id order by dept_avg_grade desc

SELECT person_name,exam_grade,depart_name as dept_name,exam_name,dep_id as dept_id FROM smart_exam_information se LEFT JOIN smart_people p ON se.id = p.exam_id left join sys_user su on p.person_id = su.id left join sys_user_depart d on d.user_id = su.id left join sys_depart sd on sd.id = d.dep_id
se.id = #{examId}
se.id= (select se.id from smart_exam_information se WHERE se.exam_endtime <= NOW() order by se.exam_endtime desc LIMIT 1)
order by p.exam_grade desc
